string.text: An unzipped basic medical package, containing a variety of equipment for treatment of minor injuries.\n \n
An unzipped military-grade medical package, containing a large amount of stimulating medical drugs.\n \n
An unzipped scientific medical package, designed for use specifically in the Zone. It contains a large amount of drugs for the purposes of countering chemical, psy- and radioactive hazards.\n \n
A zipped basic medical package containing a variety of equipment for treatment of minor injuries.\n \n
A zipped military-grade medical package, containing a large amount of stimulating medical drugs.\n \n
A zipped scientific medical package, designed for use specifically in the Zone. It contains a large amount of drugs for the purposes of countering chemical, psy- and radioactive hazards.\n \n

A medical package containing a variety of equipment for treatment of minor injuries.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CONTENTS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] bandage (4)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] diclofenac sodium
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] improvised stimpack
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] metamizole ampoule
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] mineral water
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] sulfadimethoxine
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] tourniquet
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] yadulin
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] repackable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] unzipped

A military-grade medical package, containing a large amount of stimulating medical drugs.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CONTENTS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] ampoule of morphine
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] anti-radiaton preparation
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] aquatab tablets
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] bandage (4)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] caffeine tablets
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] diclofenac sodium
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] harness (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] military stimulant
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] mineral water
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] 027 R pill
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] tetanus vaccine
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] repackable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] unzipped

A medical package, designed for use specifically in the Zone. It contains a large amount of drugs for the purposes of countering chemical, psy- and radioactive hazards.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CONTENTS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] anti-radiation drugs (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] antioxidant IP2
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] big glucose shot
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] cystamine (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] diclofenac sodium
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] epinephrine
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] harness
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] indralin-B190
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] mineral water
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] psi-block
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] scientific stimulant (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] sulfadimethoxine
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] repackable
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] unzipped
